text: Children of a Lesser God is a 1986 romantic drama movie directed by Randa Haines and based on the Tony Award winning stage play of the same name by Mark Medoff. It stars Marlee Matlin in her Oscar winning role, William Hurt, Piper Laurie, Philip Bosco and it was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Randa Haines Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Children of a Lesser God (movie)
